extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisite    A grade of B- in 6.0 units from (DRAM100;DRAM181;BISC100;BISC101) or permission of the Department.
Corequisite    DRAM240

basic.description: A credit/non-credit practicum for 36 hours of extra-curricular technical work on departmental productions.
basic.subject: DRAM
basic.title: Technical Practicum
